name: Room (InfamyKing, phloxyfables, Vasco Rocha, NotCode, scorpaust)
name_original: Room (InfamyKing, phloxyfables, Vasco Rocha, NotCode, scorpaust)
description:
The last thing you remember was lying in your bed.
What am I doing in the living room?
Everything looks so weird.
Mommy will be mad if she sees me out of bed.

I'm scared.

Mommy? Daddy? Where are you?

Teddy? What are you doing here?

How To Play:

Use the arrow keys on your keyboard or WASD to move around the world, and your mouse to look around. Press E to pickup items and objects in the Room.

Check the source code @ https://github.com/fast-coffee-moths/room
